titleStmt.title: To the Kings Most Excellent Majestie the humble petition of the countie of Cornvvall.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most Excellent Majestie: and by the assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: In this edition the eighth line of text begins: "verned".
Thanks King for laws and freedom, and for offer of general pardon. Asks him not to suffer them to fall under an arbitrary government, nor admit an alteration in religion. -- Steele.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library.

person.persName: the Kings most Excellent Majestie: and
